trans-unit.source: Learn when new features for Azure RemoteApp will be available
trans-unit.target: Learn when new features for Azure RemoteApp will be available

trans-unit.source: We are always working to improve Azure RemoteApp based on your feedback.
trans-unit.target: We are always working to improve Azure RemoteApp based on your feedback.

trans-unit.source: Here are rough time lines for future feature availability.
trans-unit.target: Here are rough time lines for future feature availability.

trans-unit.source: RemoteApp PowerShell cmdlets and SDK for deployment and management
trans-unit.target: RemoteApp PowerShell cmdlets and SDK for deployment and management

trans-unit.source: Create and upload an image from an Azure VM
trans-unit.target: Create and upload an image from an Azure VM

trans-unit.source: Deploy to a VNET without joining a domain (cloud collection connection to the Azure VMs) ([feedback](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/247748-azure-remoteapp/suggestions/5928457-provide-ability-to-add-vnet-to-cloud-deloyment-th))
trans-unit.target: Deploy to a VNET without joining a domain (cloud collection connection to the Azure VMs) ([feedback](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/247748-azure-remoteapp/suggestions/5928457-provide-ability-to-add-vnet-to-cloud-deloyment-th))

trans-unit.source: Re-use an existing virtual network for RemoteApp hybrid collection (also enables ExpressRoute) ([feedback](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/247748-azure-remoteapp/suggestions/5933123-existing-virtual-network-does-not-appear-when-tryi))
trans-unit.target: Re-use an existing virtual network for RemoteApp hybrid collection (also enables ExpressRoute) ([feedback](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/247748-azure-remoteapp/suggestions/5933123-existing-virtual-network-does-not-appear-when-tryi))

trans-unit.source: Azure RemoteApp available in the new [Azure preview portal](http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/overview/preview-portal/)
trans-unit.target: Azure RemoteApp available in the new [Azure preview portal](http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/overview/preview-portal/)

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 Universal Application for Azure RemoteApp Preview
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 Universal Application for Azure RemoteApp Preview

trans-unit.source: Ability to publish individual applications to specific users ([feedback](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/247748-azure-remoteapp/suggestions/6067043-allow-the-ability-to-publish-specific-apps-to-spec))
trans-unit.target: Ability to publish individual applications to specific users ([feedback](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/247748-azure-remoteapp/suggestions/6067043-allow-the-ability-to-publish-specific-apps-to-spec))

trans-unit.source: Other improvements added earlier this year:
trans-unit.target: Other improvements added earlier this year:

trans-unit.source: Upload line-of-business (LOB) applications to a cloud collection, as well as in a hybrid collection
trans-unit.target: Upload line-of-business (LOB) applications to a cloud collection, as well as in a hybrid collection

trans-unit.source: Provision a large number of users by using a CSV file
trans-unit.target: Provision a large number of users by using a CSV file
